words.def: make it possible through a specific action or lack of action for something to happen
an architectural partition with a height and length greater than its thickness
one who is away or absent without leave
below; towards the lower part of the rigging, or towards the decks.
leaf or strip from a leaf of the talipot palm used in India for writing paper
a pointed tool for marking surfaces or for punching small holes
nocturnal bird of prey with hawk-like beak and claws and large head with front-facing eyes
an air mass of lower pressure
the collection of rules imposed by authority
a white soft metallic element that tarnishes readily
The Indian mulberry , , especially as used to make dye.
